Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw and label a basic string telephone setup with two cups and a string.
The student can illustrate sound waves traveling through the string with wavy lines, generally indicating the presence of sound.
The student can include two students at each end of the string telephone, possibly even labeling them.
The student can demonstrate the importance of the device by illustrating a simple scene where long-distance communication is beneficial, such as two friends talking across a garden.
CANNOT: The student may inconsistently label parts of the string telephone, possibly omitting the label for sound waves or a part of the device.
The student might not fully represent materials realistically, such as using imaginative or unrealistic components instead of cups or string *(design creativity over realism)*.
The student might not clearly show the context or utility of the string telephone without additional explanation *(scene might lack clear context)*.
